meanings.definition: A protein containing a flavin cofactor.
meanings.sent1: The flavoprotein in the cell helps with energy production.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study flavoproteins to understand their role in metabolism.
meanings.sent3: The flavoprotein and its flavin cofactor had a chat about their favorite colors.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright as a flavoprotein in the dark.
meanings.sent5: The importance of the flavoprotein in the body cannot be overstated.

meanings.definition: A type of enzyme that utilizes flavin as a cofactor.
meanings.sent1: The flavoprotein catalyzes chemical reactions in the body.
meanings.sent2: Doctors are researching new medications targeting flavoproteins.
meanings.sent3: At the enzyme party, the flavoprotein was the life of the party.
meanings.sent4: His determination was a flavoprotein driving the team towards success.
meanings.sent5: The flavoprotein acts like a key, unlocking important processes in the cell.
